metadata.title: CVE-2024-35990 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: dma:xilinx_dpdma: Fix locking There are several places where either chan->lockor chan->vchan.lock was not held. Add appropriate locking.
